[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/heaps](./heaps.md)

## heaps package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DHeap](./heaps.dheap.md) | Generic d-ary heap / priority queue with configurable arity (default = 4) and ordering via user-supplied comparator. By default, implements min-heap ordering and uses [compare](./compare.compare.md)<!-- -->. The arity <code>d</code> must be &gt;<!-- -->= 2 (default: 4). If <code>d=2</code>, the default binary <code>Heap</code> implementation will be faster.[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D-ary\_heap](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D-ary_heap) |
|  [Heap](./heaps.heap.md) | Generic binary heap / priority queue with customizable ordering via user-supplied comparator. By default, implements min-heap ordering and uses @<!-- -->thi.ng/compare.
```ts
h = new Heap([20, 5, 10]);
h.push(15);

h.pop(); // 5
h.pop(); // 10
h.pop(); // 15
h.pop(); // 20
h.pop(); // undefined

```
 |
